name: NSEvent.Phase
desc: Constants that represent the possible phases during an event phase.

items.name: static var stationary: NSEvent.Phase
items.desc: An event phase is in progress but hasn't moved since the previous event.

items.name: static var cancelled: NSEvent.Phase
items.desc: The system canceled the event phase.

items.name: static var mayBegin: NSEvent.Phase
items.desc: The system event phase may begin.
